header_frame.componentleveltooltip: Any transitory effects that apply to this province will appear here. These may come from various sources including [[img:icon_hero]][[/img]]Hero actions and random events.||{{tr:click_to_open_hp}}

break_bar.comment: This component gets docked based on the current capital level. Values: The value 106 is the height of a single tree slot (74) plus the height of a single arrow (32, defined in the padding off the TreeCallback). The value 16 is half of an arrow's height. The value 29 is just margins minus an arrow's width plus some offset.

empty_slot.comment: The value 106 is the sum of the height of a tree slot (74), plus the height of an arrow(32, also defined as the TreeCallback padding)

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse(IsEmpty == false && CanShowOptionsPopup && (IsPrimary == false || CharacterContext.MilitaryForceContext.IsFixedCamp == false), self.SetProperty("mouseover", "options_list"), self.SetProperty("mouseover", ""))

contested.name: contested
contested.tooltip: This settlement is controlled by another faction.

wh2_main_skv_skaven.componentleveltooltip: Discovered Under-Cities||You may discover Under-Cities whose development has reached a great enough extent that they can no longer remain hidden.

client_state_player.name: client_state_player
client_state_player.tooltip: You are a tributary state of this faction

vassal_player.name: vassal_player
vassal_player.tooltip: You are a vassal of this faction

callback_with_context.context_function_id: self.Resize( (BuildingSetContext.MaximumChainBuildings(GetIfElse(IsContextValid( StoredContext("CcoCampaignSettlement")), StoredContext("CcoCampaignSettlement"), StoredContext("CcoCampaignCharacter") )) / 2) * 100 + ToNumber( self.GetProperty("extra_padding")), (BuildingSetContext.MaximumChainBuildings(GetIfElse(IsContextValid( StoredContext("CcoCampaignSettlement")), StoredContext("CcoCampaignSettlement"), StoredContext("CcoCampaignCharacter") )) / 2) * 100 + ToNumber(self.GetProperty("extra_padding")), true)

component_text.text: Will be abandoned next turn, left-click to cancel

header_taxes.componentleveltooltip: Control in a province is a measure of population happiness or repression, and must be kept in check to prevent the province degenerating into rebellion.||{{tr:click_to_open_hp}}

happy.name: happy
happy.tooltip: Under control||The population is either happy, or too scared of you to do anything!||Although both will keep order in your province, a happy population will increase town growth.

neutral.name: neutral
neutral.tooltip: Neutral||The population are neither unhappy nor completely under your control.||You may wish to take steps to improve your control over them, such as increasing repression.

unhappy.name: unhappy
unhappy.tooltip: Unhappy||The population is unhappy and could easily riot and rebel.||Increase repression in this area to keep things from getting worse.

coin.componentleveltooltip: This is the amount of income this province generates every turn.

header_frame.componentleveltooltip: Once [[img:icon_growth]][[/img]]growth reaches a certain threshold, [[img:icon_pop_surplus]][[/img]]population surplus is created. This can then be spent on upgrading your settlement building, which will open an additional building slot.||{{tr:click_to_open_hp}}

labour_loss.componentleveltooltip: [[col:red]]A percentage of your [[img:icon_labour]][[/img]]Labour is lost each turn based on [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]Control levels.[[/col]]

callback_with_context.context_function_id: Format(GetIfElse(StoredContext("CcoCampaignBuildingSlot").CanAffordInstantUpgrade == false, Loc("instant_building_cannot_afford"), Loc("instant_building_tooltip")), Icon, AbsoluteValue) + GetIfElse(StoredContext("CcoCampaignBuildingSlot").SettlementContext.IsUnderSiege, Loc("instant_building_under_siege"), "")

panel_smoke_t.comment: Opacity set to 0 so that when material cant be shown (loading screens) it doesnt leave a blank white image around!

coin.componentleveltooltip: This is the amount of income this province generates every turn.
